backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing a spaced repetition revision tracker with CRUD operations for main topics, subtopics, revision schedules, user settings, and profiles, including authorization checks and interval management for different difficulty levels.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining legacy types (MainTopic, SubTopic, RevisionSchedule, UserSettings, UserProfile) and an identity migration function that preserves existing actor state without transformations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the "redo tomorrow" button update that reschedules only incomplete revisions, referencing SubTopicScheduleView.tsx and useQueries.ts with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files, highlighting the redo tomorrow button's behavior of rescheduling only incomplete revisions while preserving completed ones, with detailed toast feedback.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS variables for light and dark themes, including primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, page title, root div, and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component managing authentication flow, profile setup modal display, theme provider, dashboard rendering, and loading states with Internet Identity integration.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Monthly calendar component displaying study dates and planned revision dates with individual revision numbers (1-5), completion status indicators, and mark/unmark buttons for each specific revision, including missed revision highlighting.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and attribution link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Application header with branding (Brain icon and RevisionTracker title), theme toggle button (sun/moon icons), and login/logout button with authentication state management.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup requiring name input, with form submission that calls useSaveCallerUserProfile mutation and prevents closing until completed.
frontend/src/components/SettingsView.tsx: Settings page component that allows users to configure spaced repetition intervals for easy/medium/hard difficulties and select preferred review days of the week, with options to add/remove intervals and reset to defaults.
frontend/src/components/SubTopicSchedule: Modal dialog that displays a subtopic's complete revision schedule with all planned dates, completion status, and actions to reschedule to next day or toggle individual revision completion status.
frontend/src/components/TodayView.tsx: Dashboard view showing overdue and due-today revision items with ability to mark subtopics as reviewed, displaying difficulty badges and review counts for each item.
Modal dialog displaying a main topic's details with lists of active and completed subtopics, showing difficulty, study dates, and review counts; clicking a subtopic opens its schedule view.
frontend/src/components/TopicDialog.tsx: Tabbed modal dialog for creating/editing main topics and subtopics, with form fields for title, description, difficulty level, study date, and main topic selection for subtopics.
frontend/src/components/TopicsView.tsx: Main topics management view component that displays hierarchical topics with collapsible subtopics, supports CRUD operations (create, edit, delete), completion status toggling, and includes dialogs for topic details and scheduling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, creates authenticated or anonymous actors, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including user profiles, topics, subtopics, revision schedules, and planned revision dates with toast notifications for mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors including primary, secondary, accent, destructive, and sidebar color schemes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClientProvider for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page component with tabbed navigation between Today, Topics, Calendar, and Settings views using shadcn/ui Tabs component.
frontend/src/utils/reviewStatus.ts: Utility functions for calculating review status including getting due/planned subtopics for specific dates, identifying missed revisions, and checking revision completion status.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Utility functions for converting between ICP Time (bigint nanoseconds) and JavaScript Date objects, plus date comparison, formatting, and grouping helpers for calendar functionality.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and parameter cleanup capabilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugin integrations for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking feature requests to modify the 'redo tomorrow' functionality so it only reschedules incomplete revisions rather than all revisions.
